name: electron-har
description: A command-line tool for generating HTTP Archive (HAR) (based on Electron)

scripts.build:app: mkdir -p build && cp -r src build/app && cp package.json build/app && cd build/app && npm i --production && npm un electron-prebuilt
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:app && npm run build:macosx && npm run build:linux
scripts.tar:linux: echo x64 ia32 | xargs -n1 sh -c 'cd build/electron-har-linux-$0 && tar -cvzf ../electron-har-$npm_package_version-linux-$0.tar.gz *'
scripts.tar: npm run tar:macosx && npm run tar:linux
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run tar
